content.raw: Could you try `roslaunch val_gazebo val_sim_gazebo_sync.launch` or `roslaunch val_gazebo val_sim.launch`? If that fails with the same exception then it's definitely our(NASA's) fault. Basically i'm not sure how commenting out those lines you have there are helping at all. That makes me think something else is bringing down one of our nodes and the controller_manager is just where the first exception comes in. Not really sure how that could happen though...Let me know if your able to reliably launch those two launch files.
content.html: Could you try roslaunch val_gazebo val_sim_gazebo_sync.launch or roslaunch val_gazebo val_sim.launch? If that fails with the same exception then it's definitely our(NASA's) fault. Basically i'm not sure how commenting out those lines you have there are helping at all. That makes me think something else is bringing down one of our nodes and the controller_manager is just where the first exception comes in. Not really sure how that could happen though...Let me know if your able to reliably launch those two launch files.
